attributes.action: ensure that if a Prime Minister stands down before his/her party's term has expired, an immdiate general election is held.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a member of the public votes for a party at general election, they vote for it's leader as much as anything else. For a prime ministerial succession to take place without the safety net of a poll is profoundly undemocratic.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
